text: O Ikiavɨra Itir God, nɨ uan Nguibamɨn iti, egh nɨ men dɨmdiam baragh, egh bizir me damuasa nɨn azangsɨzibar amu. Kamaghɨn, e Israelia, nɨn gumazamiziba, e ami moghɨn, nguazir kamɨn gumazamiziba bar nɨ gɨfogh, egh nɨn atiating nɨn apengan ikiam. Egh me fogh suam, Dɨpenir kɨ ingarizir kam, kar nɨn Dɨpenimra, eghtɨ nguazir kamɨn gumazamiziba an aven, me nɨn boroghɨra izam.
